p: We submitted the raw RNA sequencing data to Sequence Read Archive (SRA) where following identification numbers were assigned: PRJNA580295 and PRJNA680191. Links provided below can be accessed for raw data. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/PRJNA680191, https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/sra/?term=PRJNA580295.
